full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZAB LAM BLA MA'I NOR DANG 'BREL BAR GSHIN PO'I SPYAR CHO GA LAG TU LEN TSUL MDOR BSDUS SU BKOD PA GZHAN PHAN SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014B CES ZAB LAM BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DANG 'BREL BAR GSHIN PO'I SBYANG CHOG LAG TU LEN TSUL MDOR BSDUS SU BKOD PA GZHAN PHAN SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS KYANG NAN TAN DU BSKUL ZHING, RANG GZHAN MANG PO LA'ANG PHAN PAR BSAM STE, SNYAN RGYUD KYI GDAMS PA RGYA MTSO'I MNGA' BDAG ,RDO RJE 'CHANG RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I LAM RIM SNGON 'GRO BLA MA'I RNAL @015A *, ,'BYOR GYI ZHAL SHES KUN MKHYEN LAM BZANG DANG 'KHRID KYI BSHAD GSUNGS BSHAD KYI DGONGS DON GZHI BAR BZHAG ,MKHAS SGRUB DAM PA SO SO'I MDZAD PA'I SBYANG CHOG DU MA LA GZHIGS NAS GNAS TSAD DON 'DUS BKLAG CHOG GI TSUL DU, ^BTZUN GZUGS SNYOMS LAS PA ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES SBYAR BA'O,, 'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN 'BYOR GYUR CIG , SARBA MANGGA LAm,
